sub_title: Associate Professor, Physical and Applied Chemistry, Research and Education Support Officer at NHL Stenden
summary: Experienced University Lecturer with a demonstrated history of working in the higher education sector. Skilled in Materials Science, Spectroscopy, Electrochemical Corrosion Testing, Physical Chemistry and Lecturing. A strong education professional with a Doctor of Philosophy (Ph.D.) in the field of Semiconductors from the University of Cambridge, UK. Proven capacity for leadership as exemplified in my active involvement in Departmental, Faculty and University committees where key responsibilities and administrative roles are assumed.
